headline: Berkshire Never Emphasized Diversity in Board Selection. Buffett Looks Prescient Now.
summary: Berkshire Never Emphasized Diversity in Board Selection. Buffett Looks Prescient Now.

headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Since 1965, Berkshire Hathaway has rewarded its long-term shareholders with a phenomenal 20% annualized rate of return.  It has also made Warren Buffett an investing legend.  While every investor's portfolio should be designed to meet their individual needs, it can sometimes be useful to take a closer look at what successful investors have done to help in the decision-making process.
